name: Grim Tales: The Vengeance HD - A Hidden Objects Detective Thriller
name_original: Grim Tales: The Vengeance HD - A Hidden Objects Detective Thriller
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

You’ve been summoned to court to provide testimony in a trial against your nephew James, who stands accused of murdering his sister. Examine evidence from the crime scene to determine what really happened to Elizabeth. Can you prove James innocent and find the real killer?

• JUMP INTO THE PAST
You’re a detective with the power to learn an object’s history simply by touching it. Use this ability to help find the true killer!

• UNCOVER THE TRUTH ABOUT ELIZABETH’S MURDER
Explore the family mansion for clues but watch out—a dark force is trying to cover up the truth! Watch your step, or you could be next!

• GATHER EVIDENCE TO PRESENT AT COURT!
Use your unique powers to sort through evidence in hidden object scenes, then travel into the past connected to each object you uncover where you can further explore and solve mini-games and puzzles!

• INVESTIGATE A NEW STORY IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Reveal more of your family history by collecting figurines! Earn achievements throughout the game and enjoy beautifully rendered wallpapers and intriguing concept art!
